eventDecorators.name: Open
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when asset tokens are supplied to sponsor the yield source.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when asset tokens are supplied to sponsor the yield source.

eventDecorators.name: Shutdown
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when asset tokens are supplied to sponsor the yield source.

eventDecorators.name: Unpaused
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when asset tokens are supplied to sponsor the yield source.

eventDecorators.name: UpdatedSwapManager
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when asset tokens are supplied to sponsor the yield source.

functionDecorators.name: beforeWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Vesper pools are using this function so it should exist in all strategies.

functionDecorators.name: convertFrom18
functionDecorators.description: Convert from 18 decimals to token defined decimals. Default no conversion.

functionDecorators.name: createKeeperList
functionDecorators.description: Create keeper list. Create keeper list NOTE: Any function with onlyKeeper modifier will not work until this function is called. NOTE: Due to gas constraint this function cannot be called in constructor.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit collateral token into lending pool.

functionDecorators.name: depositAll
functionDecorators.description: Deposit all collateral token from pool to other lending pool. Anyone can call it except when paused.

functionDecorators.name: interestEarned
functionDecorators.description: Returns interest earned since last rebalance. Empty implementation because V3 Strategies should collect interest on rebalance.

functionDecorators.name: isReservedToken
functionDecorators.description: This method is deprecated and will be removed from Strategies in next release.

functionDecorators.name: isUpgradable
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if strategy can be upgraded. If there are no vTokens in strategy then it is upgradable.

functionDecorators.name: migrateIn
functionDecorators.description: For moving between versions of similar strategies.

functionDecorators.name: migrateOut
functionDecorators.description: For moving between versions of similar strategies.

functionDecorators.name: rebalance
functionDecorators.description: Calculate interest fee on earning from VesperV3 and transfer fee to fee collector. Deposit available collateral from pool into VesperV3. Anyone can call it except when paused.

functionDecorators.name: resetApproval
functionDecorators.description: Reset approval of all required tokens.

functionDecorators.name: sweepErc20
functionDecorators.description: sweep given token to vesper pool.

functionDecorators.name: token
functionDecorators.description: Returns address of token correspond to collateral token.

returnDecorators.description: Return value will be in collateralToken defined decimal.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw collateral token from lending pool.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAll
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw all collateral. No rebalance earning. Controller only function, called when migrating strategy.
